content.prompt: Which of the following best defines Carl Sauer’s concept of cultural landscape?

choices.label: It is the way people landscape their yards in different parts of the world.
It is the way houses of worship are built.
It is the outcome of interactions between humans and their natural environment.
It is a shared set of meanings and symbolic practices.
It is the human adaptation to Earth’s physical environment.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
